post.body: Thanks! I may have some gardening questions for you in the spring...looking forward to growing lots of veggies next year!
new to Twitter?
I nominate @wsdot for a Shorty Award in #news because even though it's not perfect, it's the best traffic report this town has
I nominate @aplacetobark for a Shorty Award in #nonprofits because she personally rescues SO many dogs and finds them homes.
agreed - I got past the 520 merge and hit 70. Nasty rain, tho.
yeah, any idea why? @wsdot Do you know why northbound I-5 downtown is so bad?
You bet - I've emailed the expert; will let you know what he says. I personally like the less peaty ones, but that's just me.
it's so HARD some days. Grrrr.
I wish...!
You're interesting. And you can spell. :)
Life is short!
You're right. Added.
test worked.
WHERE??
Don't believe the LIES.
I can't help getting my hopes up though. :(
Lots of cats are indoor-only.
Thanks but @evilbusdriver says it's not going to snow. Who to believe??
haha - best tweet all week there gal!
Will do!
No, there's another panel to the left that you can kind of see; still working on it.
thanks! It's a page from an old book (nothing of literary value) :)
Roger that! The SUN IS SHINING IN SHORELINE!!
The NOAA forecast for Shoreline shows rain, rain, rain: http://is.gd/dQqj Pretty typical winter weather, back to normal.
Oh boy, I hope so! It would be nice to - oh, I don't know - GO someplace.
Sounds great! We have to meet up with family tonight or we'd have you over. What're you guys doing for new years?
Haha - it would be too big for her little (?!) mouth. She got a belly full o' ham last night though. As did we all. :)
If it's something where you need a passport and you don't have one, go at once on Monday and apply!
Cleaning house today, small get-together this evening for a bunch of crazy people: we're singing for charity tonight at grocery store.
So tired of monkeys. And incorrect dielines. And rain that isn't snow.
RIP Bettie Page. Sleep well, brave girl.
I must sound like such a bitch, but IRL I'm pretty nice.
Did you ever have to work with someone who just set your teeth on edge? Having that kind of day. (No one here. Love you Twitterverse.)
Tonight's threefold plan for success: 1. Walked dog. 2. Ate tacos. 3. Did 6 monkey thumbnail sketches. Now sleep! http://snipurl.com/7rnex
Unfollowing people who only pimp their blogs, tweet constantly about what's on their iPod, or can't spell or punctuate past 3rd grade level.
Funny comment of the day: "Will this photo work for a high-resolution image? He took it with his iPhone." Sad more than funny...
There's definitely precipitation here. More hail than snow, though.
Re-pinging @wakingjonas: Snowing at 130th near shoreline #seast http://twitpic.com/tqy8
Driving behind a fleet of snowplows and sanding trucks!
Re-pinging @likeSunday: @joeltelling Edmonds is getting pounded on.
Look at this balmy, NOT-SNOWY weather! http://snipurl.com/8p3rl
It's raining here, just a bit. And I see blue sky. :(
Dear Seattle weather forecasters: I hate you. #seatst
Sun is shining in SODO. Very strange.
It just started snowing a tiny bit in Shoreline around 8 am. Nothing coming down in SODO yet.
Watching the first ep. of True Blood. So far, looks pretty good! Good concept.
Home again, where I can enjoy the melodious sound of car tires squealing as they try to get up our hill. Rrrrrreeeeeee! EEeeerrrr. Rrr. Rr.
Well, IS IT going to snow tonight or ISN'T IT? Hasn't weather prediction tech advanced beyond the Iron Age yet??
I hate it when adult women scream like 12-year-olds. Is that bad? I can't help it. But really. Come on.
WHAT? Women can't compete in Olympic ski jumping?? http://www.wsj2010.com/ Thanks @NPRnews for the story. What a travesty.
O train, hateful train; you block my way home. Why must you stop there in the road for so long during commute time?
Tim Burton's upcoming movie "9" looks pretty visually amazing. Hope the writing is not as bad as some of his recent stuff. http://is.gd/dgyT
Back to work...now, THAT was a nice holiday vacation. I think I'm going to do this every year (even if it doesn't snow). So relaxing!
Painting an octopus. Love those beautiful creatures. http://snipurl.com/97ipv
Took the dog for a half-hearted game of frisbee at the park. No one likes running around in that slush.
Drawing and watching documentaries on Netflix. Just watched "Methadonia" - very good doc about methadone addiction.
Went out to dinner last night and on a whim, ordered an Old Fashioned. I think I have a new favorite drink!
Holy crap it's almost 2009. Still no flying car. Check next year.
We're making ham soup; giant hamhock from last night's dinner is simmering in a pot with beans. Can't wait!
RT @cnn: Man shoots talker at movies, police say http://tinyurl.com/7re7re Take note, people who talk during the film!! :)
